extendedInfo.description: Without being lost in 1000+++ needless newspapers just read MAJOR US newspapers, news sites online. You can find news from Wall Street Journal, USA Today, New York Times, Los Angeles Times, Daily News, CNN, Fox News, Chicago Tribune, Reuters, Newsday, ABC, New York Post, Local Wireless, CNBC, Fox News . Our application is just in version 1.0.0 . Thank you for your kindly understanding of development process.Categories: Community Investing, Housing, Microlending, Small business	Education, General Social Investing, Book Reviews, Interviews/speeches	Business Ethics, Ethics policy and training, Global ethics, Ethical marketing, Product development, Pricing, billing, contracting, Product quality and safety, Consumer privacy	Corporate, Technology, Healthcare, Financials, Utilities, Basic Materials, Transportation, Consumer staples, Consumer cyclicals, Construction & housing, Energy, Natural resources, Telecommunications, Capital Goods, Green Companies, Community Economic Dev, Recruitment, employment, Retention of underutilized workers, Financial investments, Siting in underserved area (corp or retail), Minority and women business development, Corporate Governance, Board diversity, Board terms and selection, Director and CEO compensation, Shareholder engagement	Environment, Air emissions, Alternative energy, Climate change, Forestry, Energy efficiency and conservation, Green building or product design, Recycling, Sustainable business practices, Toxic substances, Natural resource use, Water conservation and quality, Human Rights, Child labor policies, Discrimination policies, Health and safety, Codes of conduct, Living wage, Working hours	Workplace, Childcare, Unions, Training, Domestic partner benefits, Workplace culture, Health and safety, Diversity, Domesitic Violence, Flexible scheduling	Volunteerism & Philanthropy, Corporate Volunteerism, Philanthropy	Stock Indexes, U.S International

reviews.title: An outstanding app!
reviews.comment: Nice clean interface, loads fast, has the news outlets I frequent most... and greatest of all: no screen space stolen by ads !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fit and Quick
reviews.comment: I had many app of news. This is the winner
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I dont rate too much, but this is an excellent app. I love the reviews of the articles as well. Dont hesitate installing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Clean, simple, fast.
reviews.author: Jared Eaton
